Description:
Under Offer
This unique home has a feel that can't be replicated and is sure to wow all who inspect. With soaring ceilings, exposed timber and timeless appeal makes this large home well suited to all families, couples, holiday makers and anyone after that ideal place to call home. Comprising: 4 bedrooms with ensuite off master, open plan kitchen, meals and lounge, upstairs retreat, central bathroom, side drive to genuine 4 car garage with bathroom/huge workshop, landscaped garden and a rear studio currently used for art. Special features include: claw foot bath, wood fire heater, a unique open plan design, loads of natural light with an outdoor aspect from every room and a classic mud brick finish. Close to public transport, local shops & schools, minutes drive to Somers beach and some of the Peninsula's leading wineries and great freeway access for a short trip to town. A must see!

Description:
Under Offer
Family Friendly Layout
Superbly renovated with focus on a free flowing quality family lifestyle, this open plan weatherboard combines unrivalled design with its enviable position. Meticulous attention is devoted to all three bedrooms, two bathrooms and study, beautifully styled with optimum natural light and practical modern appeal.
The large master retreat is situated upstairs with full ensuite and private balcony overlooking the treetops of Crib Point. A secluded study or fourth bedroom with open fire place is positioned at the front of the home and a superb open living space that greets you as you enter the home follows onto a large kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large pantry, and an abundance of bench and cupboard space. The adjoining dining area features bifold doors stretching out to your vast decking area with feature gazebo and a magnificent secure grassed area.
Crib Point Primary School and St Joseph's Primary School are just around the corner and local parks, local shopping village and Crib Point train station are an easy walk. With a host of quality inclusions: ducted heating throughout the home and air conditioning in the master, polished boards, large family bathroom with spa bath, separate toilet and side access to the rear of the property.
Call Jason Dowler on 0403 598 754 today to arrange your private inspection or for more information.

Description:
Looking for the savvy investor!
This cute mud brick home is situated on a 1011 (approx) block of natural bush land setting. The homes offers a well zoned functional floorplan with a sense of space, privacy and warmth. Features include:
*3 bedrooms plus study/fourth bedroom with built-in robes
Master with built-in robes and full ensuite
2 large living areas
Kitchen with new benchtops, and plenty of storage
Family bathroom
Studio/home office perfect for business or teenage retreat
Wood heater and wood storage shed
Paved under roofline entertaining area
Public transport, local shopping strip, schools, kindergardens, Hastings Business Centre within a short drive. Currently tenanted at $350 per week with the ideal tenants looking for long term stay!

Description:
under Offer!
Lifestyle, Invest or Develop (1900m2 approx.)
A wonderful warmth of character fills the inviting spaces of this charming three bedroom Period property. Separate entry leads to both living area with period fire-place, recently renovated kitchen with Stainless Steel appliances and flows seamlessly to sunny rear under cover decked entertaining area.
Bright, spacious bathroom serves three generous bedrooms in style with a separate laundry to the rear. Highlighted by decorative cornices, ornate ceiling roses and 10' high ceilings, this property is sure to impress.
On a generous 1900sqm block, this makes the property the ideal asset for either the live in purchaser, investor or developer purchaser.
Conveniently located within a short walk to Shops, Bus, Train, School, Day Care and Sporting Grounds, this property is definitely one to see and well worth an inspection.

Description:
Family Friendly on 1/4 Acre
Located on a quiet no-thru street this 3 bedroom plus study home is ideal for a family looking for more space without blowing the budget.
The home has real character with exposed brick and timber paneling throughout and includes a good size lounge, master bedroom with ensuite and BIRs plus access to the study. There is a large family/dining room with split system heating/cooling and a timber kitchen.
The kids will love the large block (0.25 acre approx) with plenty of room to play while Mum and Dad enjoy the paved entertaining area. There is also a single carport and shedding.

Description:
Renovate or Rebuild - Auction THIS Saturday
This is a real opportunity for the astute buyer to renovate or rebuild in this prime location of Crib Point.
Set on 952 m2 (approx) in a popular pocket of Crib Point, this property could prove to present a unique opportunity for renovation or rebuild (stca).
Showcasing the polished floor boards, this three bedrooms plus study home would be the purchase of the year. The home has a large main bedroom featuring ensuite and walk in robe, main family bathroom with spa, vaulted ceiling in living and open plan kitchen, living and meals area. Two wood heaters and ducted heating throughout warm the house and will keep the coldest of nights at bay.
An expansive backyard is perfect for entertaining or kids to play and with a double garage and carport to the side of the property, this ensures ample car space for the whole family.
Bring your tools and your imagination to either finish the job or simply rebuild (stca). The option is yours.
Close to schools, shops sporting and transport, makes this the ideal location.
Call Pam Pester on 0499 621 116 for your private inspection.

Under Offer
Near New, 3 Bed, Ensuite and Double Garage!
Secure this great property situated in the perfect location overlooking Woolleys beach foreshore reserve in the more peaceful part of Crib Point.
From the moment you step inside this near new 3 bedroom villa unit you'll think you're in a house! You'll be amazed at the space on offer with a large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge area. With walk in robe and full ensuite to the spacious master bedroom, and robes to remaining 2 bedrooms, a central bathroom with loads of natural light and an outdoor area to be the envy of family and friends. The modern kitchen features s/s appliances, gas cooking and loads of cupboard space. With added features of a double garage with internal access and gas ducted heating all the boxes are ticked! If you're looking to start off, downsize or as a great investment with fantastic return then the search is over, have style and space without the upkeep!
Call Jason Dowler now to organise an inspection!

Description:
Pretty as a Picture
Why buy a unit that’s a dime a dozen, when you could have this beautiful home on it’s own parcel of land with real character and country charm?
From the moment you pull into the driveway you will fall in love with this home’s immaculate presentation and warm, inviting feel. A wide paved and covered verandah welcomes you home and inside you will adore the charming touches that truly make this house a home.
Featuring 2 generous bedrooms, a country style kitchen with gas cooking and plenty of cupboard space, a large lounge with gas log fire to keep you cozy plus ceiling fans throughout.
Outside there are delightful yet easy to maintain gardens with an arbour feature, a garden shed and workshop plus an over sized tandem carport all situated on a 502m2 (approx) block.
Relocated to its current position around 5 years ago with new stumps and wiring and ideally located towards the end of a no through road and within walking distance to schools and public transport.

Description:
Under Offer!
Back on the Market! Will sell quickly!
Situated within a quiet established pocket of Crib Point is this near new four bedroom home that simply has it all!
On a generous ¼ acre (approx) with side access, loads of backyard area & a large powered garage to the rear of the property. A double lock up garage is also positioned under roofline, now you can have the modern home in a desired location within a short distance to all facilities!
The home itself includes built in robes to all bedrooms with full ensuite to the master, three living areas, central kitchen which features island bench, ample storage and stainless steel appliances. Separate meals area is positioned to the side of the kitchen, the living room is open and the plan is open and practical. A great alfresco area is positioned to the side of the home for all year round entertaining. Additional features include evaporative cooling, ducted heating and ducted vacuum.
Be quick to inspect! Only a short distance to the Crib Point shops, Stony Point Ferry, Crib Point Train Station, Woolleys beach reserve and great freeway access to the peninsula.
Call Jason Dowler on 0403 598 754 today for any further information or to book your private inspection.

Description:
Affordability Plus Potential
Located on a corner block this 3 bedroom brick veneer home is an ideal option for first home buyers, investors or anyone looking for an affordable home in a growing area with plenty of potential.
Internally, this home caters for everyone with 3 good sized bedrooms, large lounge with coonara and air-conditioning, an updated kitchen with adjoining meals area plus a separate formal dining or second living room with sliding door access to a covered and patterned concrete entertaining area and a Colorbond garden shed.
Additional outdoor features include a double carport and high front fence for privacy all on a 534m2 approx, low maintenance block.

Address: 342 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
PERIOD STYLE FAMILY HOME
This very affordable neat and tidy 3 B/R Period Style Family Home on a large 1/4 acre allotment surrounded by an established and very private setting makes an ideal first home buyer or tradie's delight. With traditional features in the formal lounge and master bedroom such as leadlight windows, decorative lace work cornices, high ceilings, picture rails makes this home unique in its own way. There is hardwood flooring throughout most of the home and the kitchen has the traditional fireplace and new gas hotplates with bench oven. Heating and cooling is taken care of with a gas log fire in the lounge room and cooling in the master bedroom. Outside boasts a double carport, garage with office/studio, chook pen and the backyard is well secured by near new fencing surrounding. Zoned Res 1 this allotment has the potential to be a unit development site. A must see to appreciate the charm and beauty of this property! Contact Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996.

Description:
Under Offer!
What a Fantastic Opportunity!
Within walking distance to primary schools, Crib Point Shops and public transport this property sure has location ticked.
Set on a generous ¼ acre (approx) allotment and offers four large bedrooms this home would suit an investor, first home buyer or someone looking to downsize. In addition to great location the home offers multiple light and bright functional living areas. The centrally appointed kitchen overlooks the living room and the meals area which leads out to a large pergola that runs the length of the home, perfect for entertaining all year round and a private secure yard for your children and the family pets.
There is ample off street parking with double lock up garage and long driveway perfect for boats, caravans, trailers or a small truck. List of extras include ceiling fans, timber blinds, sun blinds and so much more.
The central area of Crib Point is one of the most established and one of the more sort after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and newer units. Located only a short distance to all facilities including, Crib Point shops, Stony Point Ferry, Crib Point Train Station, Woolleys beach reserve and great freeway access to the peninsula provides the perfect combination for any resident.
Call Jason Dowler on 0403 598 754 today for any further information or to book your private inspection.

Address: 2/234 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Under Offer!
Position, Privacy and Great Investment Potential!
Only one of four, this lovely like new 2 bedroom unit boasts position and privacy within close walking distance to transport, general store, cafes and local schools. This great buy offers terrific investment potential with a current tenant in place on a month by month tenancy agreement or would make an ideal new home to the first home buyer or perfectly suitable for the retired couple looking for a quiet getaway with every-thing close at hand. With everything you need to make life comfortable including the convenience of direct access from the remote garage, dishwasher and reverse cycle air-conditioner and semi- ensuite, this attractive unit would please all those looking for an affordable investment or permanent home.

Description:
A Bargain Beginning
Here is an affordable opportunity for the keen renovator or first time developer. Located on a large block (approx 846m2) this older style home is in need of a bit of love but still boasts some great features including high ceilings, large formal lounge and a cute country style kitchen with French doors and an island bench. Move in and work on restoring this home to its former glory or knock it down to create a two unit site (S.T.C.A), the choice is yours.
